Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 54th overall pick, by Wisconsin in 1978...
Traded from Wisconsin to West Texas on 7/21/1979 (Going to WT: RF E. Gatson, SS G. Valls. Going to WIS: P M. Cortes, CF A. Render)...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 8/13/1980, off Joseph Ping (Ash)...
Injured on 7/22/1981 with a Torn Calf Muscle, out for full season...
Injured on 4/17/1982 with a Blister On Finger, out for 3 days...
Injured on 8/5/1986 with a Tight Shoulder, out for 4 days...
Signed as a free agent by Boston (UBA) on 2/15/1988 to a 4-year deal worth $400,000 per year...
